title: Adobe Garamond font examples
content:

Can you cite some websites, organizations, magazines etc. etc. which uses Adobe Garamond font?

comments.content: The new Gerrit Rietveld Magazine uses Adobe Garamond. Come and get it at the opening this wednesday-sunday in Amsterdam. If you can’t make it, then it’s usually available from [http://www.nijhoflee.nl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171816/http:/www.nijhoflee.nl/ "http://www.nijhoflee.nl/") in the time after the show.
You didn’t ask about books, but I seem to recall reading here that the US editions of the Harry Potter books are set in Adobe Garamond. I wonder what typeface the UK editions use.
